#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<math.h>
#include<iomanip>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;

int t,n,a[105],ans,i,mark,counter,c;
int main()
{
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
        }

        sort(a,a+n);

        ans=a[0];
        c=0;
        counter=0;
        mark=ans;
       for(i=0;i<n;i++)
       {
           if(a[i]==ans)
            {   c++;
                ans=a[i];
            }
            if(counter<c)
            {   counter=c;
                mark=ans;
            }
           if(a[i]!=ans)
           {    c=1;
               ans=a[i];
           }

       }
             cout<<mark<<" "<<counter<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
